display_name: Obstructive Apnea-Hypopnea Index : (Obstructive apneas with no oxygen desaturation threshold used and with or without arousal+ hypopneas with > 50% flow reduction and >= 3% oxygen desaturation and with or without arousal) / hour of sleep from type I polysomnography
description: Calculated - Summary metric of sleep disordered breathing events.
calculation: 60 * (hrembp3 + hrop3 + hnrbp3 + hnrop3 + oarbp + oarop + oanbp + oanop) / slpprdp
